Uses of Interface
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.criteria.Criteria

Packages that use Criteria
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm Provides the classes necessary for the Infinitum ORM. 
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.criteria Provides classes for the criteria API, which is used to construct database queries based on objects rather than SQL. 
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.criteria.criterion Provides the criterion classes, which together form a Criteria query. 
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sql Provides utility classes for constructing and executing SQL statements. 
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite.impl Provides concrete implementations for the SQLite ORM framework. 
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.rest.impl Provides concrete implementations for the RESTful client framework.
